titleStmt.title: Rhodon and Iris· A pastorall, as it vvas presented at the florists feast in Norwich, May 3. 1631.
titleStmt.author: Knevet, Ralph, 1600-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Beale] for Michael Sparke, at the blew Bible in Greene-Arbour,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with E. Causon's name in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
